titleStmt.title: A ra-ree show to the tune of I am a senceless thing.
titleStmt.author: Colledge, Stephen, 1635?-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B.T., and sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Colledge.
Second leaf contains engraved cartoon entitled: West-ward hoy.
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
